description: This file provides database utility functions for connecting to a PostgreSQL database, executing queries, and fetching results. It includes functions to handle environment variables for database connection, manage connections with a context manager, and perform common database operations like fetching multiple or single records and executing statements with RETURNING clauses.

methods.name: str _get_database_url()
methods.description: Retrieves the PostgreSQL DSN from environment variables, raising an error if not found.

methods.name: Iterator[psycopg2.extensions.connection] get_connection()
methods.description: Context manager that yields a PostgreSQL connection object, ensuring it is properly closed after use.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] fetch_all(query: str, params: Optional[tuple] = None)
methods.description: Executes a SELECT query and returns all result rows as a list of dictionaries.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] fetch_one(query: str, params: Optional[tuple] = None)
methods.description: Executes a SELECT query and returns a single result row as a dictionary, or None if no result.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] execute_returning_one(query: str, params: Optional[tuple] = None)
methods.description: Executes an INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE statement with a RETURNING clause, returning the resulting row as a dictionary.

ctags.name: execute_returning_one
ctags.pattern: /^def execute_returning_one(query: str, params: Optional[tuple] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: fetch_all
ctags.pattern: /^def fetch_all(query: str, params: Optional[tuple] = None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: fetch_one
ctags.pattern: /^def fetch_one(query: str, params: Optional[tuple] = None) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:$/
